forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of drizzle after 11pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
This afternoon in Downtown San Francisco, the city basks in a mostly sunny glow, the air crisp and invigorating, yet beneath this radiant façade, a gentle chill lingers. While the high temperature hovers around a temperate 65 degrees, expect the afternoon to weave its way toward a cooler, calmer 63, as the west-southwest winds parade through at about 21 mph. These breezes, occasionally gusting to 26 mph, serve as a reminder of the ocean's influence, stirring the air with both a refreshing and slightly brisk touch.

As the sun gives way to evening, the sky will cloak itself in a veil of cloud, hinting at a slight chance of drizzle after 11 PM. The temperature will nestle down to around a soft 57 degrees, making light layers essential for comfort. As the evening approaches, the city feels alive with the promise of understated adventure. A casual stroll along the waterfront, or perhaps a quiet moment spent sipping coffee at an outdoor café, would be delightful. Attire in soft, warm layers, embracing the mildness of the day while preparing for the evening chill, will keep one at ease. The marine layer will be nearby, flirting with the edges of the bay, promising to return as night descends, but for now, enjoy the clarity and charm of this San Francisco afternoon.
